review: I bought this Amazon fire stick with much excitement, however, I have very quickly been disappointed with this product and amazons customer service. The device will not load nor stay connected to the wifi while this is the only decide connected at a home private network. Not really sure how this is supposed to work at a dorm or hotel setting.  I was on the phone with customer service for almost 40 minutes and the representative seemed lost and confused while my issue has still not been resolved. It will be sent back soon.
